author: Reuters
title: Highest daily rise in Tokyo
description: Some 143 more cases of the SARS-CoV-2 virus have been reported in Tokyo, the city’s Governor said on Sunday, with the highest daily jump bringing the number of cases in the Japanese capital to more th
content:
Some 143 more cases of the SARS-CoV-2 virus have been reported in Tokyo, the citys Governor said on Sunday, with the highest daily jump bringing the number of cases in the Japanese capital to more than 1,000.
The number of cases with untraceable transmission… [+192 chars]
